prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The Book language is structured around three main concepts: What (Workflows, Tasks, and Parameters), Who (Personas), and How (Knowledge, Instruments, and Actions).

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}
